content: HunnyPlay is looking for local ambassadors to help promote our slot and live casino games in your region.HunnyPlay.io, The Best Crypto Casino up to 180% Welcome BonusDeposit, withdraw and wager with a wide range of cryptocurrencies, all transactions and deposits are transparent and secure. Choose from over 5000+ games such as Slots, Bingo, Money Wheel, Deal or No Deal, Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, Sic Bo, Poker, RNG and LIVE games.Why play with Hunnyplay.io?- 180%first time deposit bonus - 28% cashback bonus- Flexible affiliate  system that user can create many links- VIP levelling up bonus- Daily Free Spin- Staking of 65% APR, rewards in BNB, BUSD and CAKE- 5000+ games- Lots of ongoing daily promotion for you to participageBitcointalk link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422950.0************************************************************************** We are looking for HunnyPlay Ambassador!The HunnyPlay Ambassadors’ main role will be tasked with promoting HunnyPlay’s games and events Preferred Countries: Thailand, Indonesia, China, Vietnam, Malaysia, India, Japan, Taiwan, non exhaustive Preferred Languages: Chinese, Indian, Spanish, Japan, Bahasa, non exhaustive HunnyPlay is looking for someone who is passionate about the gaming industry, has an understanding of the digital landscape, and has excellent communication skills.Apply if you feel that you: Are able to write fluently in these languages: Chinese, Indian, Spanish, Japan, Bahasa, and othersHave your own community of followersHave tested and proven effective ways to market iGaming[/color] You can be rewarded well with a customised and fair affiliate system for you based on your performance.Talk to us now to find out more!

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: This is more ideal on the Marketplace (Altcoins) [https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=161.0] assuming that you'll pay the ambassadors in your altcoin.Therefore, you have to move this thread/topic onto that section from here to there.
